summary: This is an email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney in the Southern District of New York transmitting sealed grand jury (Rule 6(e)) disclosure materials related to Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes two attachments: the full application and order, and the order itself.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Sender of the email transmitting sealed grand jury disclosure materials regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Transmission of 6(e) Disclosure Materials
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends an email with attachments containing a sealed grand jury (Rule 6(e)) disclosure application and order related to Jeffrey Epstein.
personsInvolved: Assistant U.S. Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: The document is an email dated February 3, 2020, concerning sealed grand jury materials under Federal Rule of Criminal Procedure 6(e).
The sender is an Assistant U.S. Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
Two attachments are included: the full application and order for disclosure, and a file containing just the order.
The subject matter is specifically related to Jeffrey Epstein, indicating ongoing legal proceedings or investigations involving him in early 2020.
The communication follows up on a discussion held earlier on the same day, suggesting active coordination regarding the disclosure of sensitive grand jury information.
